name: linter-yalafi
description: This package is linting LaTeX files for spelling and grammar errors

language.description: Specify the language of your LaTeX file. (en-GB, de-DE, fr-FR)

server.title: Select LanguageTool instance
server.description: YaLafi offers different servers that can be used to check your LaTeX files

disabledRules.title: Ignored LanguageTool rules
disabledRules.description: Comma-separated list of LanguageTool rules that should be ignored

executablePath.description: Command or full path to python.

languageToolnGramDataPath.title: LanguageTool path for n-gram data
languageToolnGramDataPath.description: Path to n-gram data. It is automatically added to the LanguageTool server options if present

languageToolServerOptions.title: LanguageTool server options
languageToolServerOptions.description: Additional options passed to the local LanguageTool server while starting. The path for n-gram data is added automatically if given.

disableTimeout.title: Disable Execution Timeout
disableTimeout.description: By default processes running longer than 30 seconds will be automatically terminated. Enable this option if you are getting messages about process execution timing out.

disableCRLFWarning.title: Disable CRLF conversion warning
disableCRLFWarning.description: It can cause problems if the end of line mode is set to CRLF. To prevent problems linter-YaLafi notifies you and gives you the option to automatically convert from CRLF to LF
